option_1.title: Header Background Color
option_1.description: Configure background color for header of the app

option_2.title: Header Font and Icon Color
option_2.description: Configure font and icon color for header of the app

option_3.title: Text Color
option_3.css: .ui-select span, .category_menu_box .ui-listview .ui-btn.ui-btn-d,.ui-overlay-a, .ui-page-theme-a, .ui-page-theme-a .ui-panel-wrapper,.new-catpage ul li a,.filter-bar .filter-div .filter-by, .filter-bar .filter-div .short-by,.rating-product a h3,h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6,.color-primary,[class^="list-"] li, [class^="list-"] li > a,[class^="list-"] h4,.shopping-cart-list .product-name h4,.data-table tr th,.tab-nav.ui-tabs ul li.ui-state-default a,.tab-nav .tab-detail label span.price,.product-slide-horizontal span,.listing-button a.ui-link,label.ui-checkbox-off.ui-btn, label.ui-checkbox-on.ui-btn,label.ui-radio-off.ui-btn, label.ui-radio-on.ui-btn,.or-login,.address-block p,.shopping-cart-total .left.color-light,#order_success p,#review_list .product-detail-text section h3.color-warning,#review_form .rating .left,#storelocator_rating_list .product-detail-text section h3.color-warning { color: rgba(--COLOR--,1); }|p,.ui-page-theme-a a.v-all-right,.product-slide-horizontal .swiper-slide .eachproduct a,.new-catpage ul li li a,.availability p, .availability .data-table,.shopping-cart-list .color-light,.user-menu ul li a,.shopping-cart-list p,.rating,.address-block .user-name,.address-block,.left-call a strong,.data-table tr td,.button-list .li-row,.ui-page-theme-a a, html .ui-bar-a a,html .ui-body-a a, html body .ui-group-theme-a a,input[type=text],input[type=email],input[type=password],input[type=email], input[type=file], input[type=number],input[type=search],input[type=tel],select,textarea,.orderhistory-list a.icon-arow p.color-light,.orderhistory-detail p.color-light,.tab-nav ul li a,.ui-page-theme-a .ui-btn, html .ui-bar-a .ui-btn, html .ui-body-a .ui-btn, html body .ui-group-theme-a .ui-btn, .ui-page-theme-a .ui-checkbox-on::after, html .ui-bar-a .ui-checkbox-on::after, html .ui-body-a .ui-checkbox-on::after, html body .ui-group-theme-a .ui-checkbox-on::after, .ui-btn.ui-checkbox-on.ui-btn-a::after, .ui-page-theme-a .ui-flipswitch-active, html .ui-bar-a .ui-flipswitch-active, html .ui-body-a .ui-flipswitch-active, html body .ui-group-theme-a .ui-flipswitch-active, html body .ui-flipswitch.ui-bar-a.ui-flipswitch-active,.filter-bar .filter-div .filter-by span.applied-label, .filter-bar .filter-div .short-by span.applied-label,.ui-body-a, .ui-page-theme-a .ui-body-inherit, html .ui-bar-a .ui-body-inherit, html .ui-body-a .ui-body-inherit, html body .ui-group-theme-a .ui-body-inherit, html .ui-panel-page-container-a { color: rgba(--COLOR--,0.7); }|.color-light,.rating-product .rating-digit,.ui-controlgroup-controls label span,.user-menu ul li.has-optn span,.ratingbar div.right { color: rgba(--COLOR--,0.5); }|::-webkit-input-placeholder{color:rgba(--COLOR--,0.7) !important;}|:-moz-placeholder{color:rgba(--COLOR--,0.7) !important;}|::-moz-placeholder{color:rgba(--COLOR--,0.7) !important;}|:-ms-input-placeholder{color:rgba(--COLOR--,0.7) !important;}
option_3.description: Configure text color of the app

option_4.title: Background Color of Primary Button
option_4.description: Configure background color for all primary buttons such as Buy Now, Process to Checkout, Continue, Place Order etc

option_5.title: Text Color of Primary Button
option_5.description: Configure text Color of primary buttons such as Buy Now, Process to Checkout, Continue, Place Order etc

option_6.title: Background Color of Secondary Button
option_6.css: html head + body .ui-btn.ui-btn-a, html head + body .ui-btn.ui-btn-b { background-color: --COLOR--; border-color: --COLOR--; }
option_6.description: Configure background color for all secondary buttons such as -,+, Login, Signup, Forgot Password etc

option_7.title: Text Color of Secondary Button
option_7.css: html head + body .ui-btn.ui-btn-a, html head + body .ui-btn.ui-btn-b { color: --COLOR--; }
option_7.description: Configure text Color of secondary buttons such as -,+, Login, Signup, Forgot Password etc

option_9.title: Rating Color
option_9.description: Configure rating icon and background color

option_20.title: Footer Background Color
option_20.description: Configure background color for footer of the app

option_21.title: Footer Font and Icon Color
option_21.description: Configure font and icon color for footer of the app

option_22.title: Footer Active Font and Icon Color
option_22.css: .persistent_footer li.active a.ui-btn, .persistent_footer li.active a.ui-btn span,.persistent_footer li.active a.ui-btn em.cart-buble {color: --COLOR--;}
option_22.description: Configure font and icon color for active footer of the app
